title: Oreo Trifle
directions: You want to start by preparing the brownies or cake. If you choose to use store bought then you can get started right away, otherwise wait until your brownies/cake have cooled.
Next, prepare your pudding. I recommend using the instant pudding. Mix with milk. Refrigerate a few minute to set up.
You will then need to crush up the oreos into small pieces. I did this by placing them into a baggie and using our rolling pin. You can actually just use your hands because they crumble very easily.
Layer of Brownies, Layer of Chocolate Pudding, Layer of Cool Whip, Layer of Crushed Oreos
I then added the crushed Oreos to the top to make it look nice!
ingredients: Brownies or Cake {these can be homemade or store bought}
2 Containers of Cool Whip or 1 Large container
Extras: you can add caramel sauce or hot fudge
